title: Comedy Lounge Ad - 1950's?
content:
Would appreciate assistance in identifying the font used in this ad.

Thanks so much.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [50's font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140927000353/http:/typophile.com/files/50's%20font.jpg) | 33.14 KB |
author: scraplete

comments.content: It's [Kon Tiki Aloha Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20140927000353/http:/marketplace.veer.com/font/Kon-Tiki-Aloha-Pro-JBT0001015) by Jason Walcott for Jukebox Type .
